decision_conditions: The approved roof plan Plan 1a below (Drawing No. KDNH-IBI-00-RF-M2-BA-000-0104 Rev 3 Proposed Roof Plan 05/03/2019) approved under original 19/00582/FUL planning permission, be replaced by the newly-proposed roof plan Plan 1b below (Drawing No. KDNH-IBI-00-RF-M2-BA000-0600 Rev 19 Proposed Roof Plan).The approved elevational drawing Plan 2a below (Drawing No. KDNH-IBI-00-ZZ-M2-BA-000-0200 Rev 22 Proposed Elevations) approved under subsequent Non-Material Amendment 21/02221/NMA but which erroneously omitted the louvres, be replaced by the newly-proposed elevational drawing Plan 2b below (Drawing No. KDNH-IBI-00-ZZ-M2-BA-000-0200 Rev 27 Proposed Elevations - Amalgamated NMA), andThe approved second floor plan Plan 3a below (Drawing No. KDNH-IBI-00-02-M2-BA-000-0103 Rev 20 Proposed Second Floor Plan) approved under subsequent Non-Material Amendment 21/02221/NMA be replaced by the newly-proposed second floor plan Plan 3b below (Drawing No. KDNH-IBI-00-02-M2-BA-000-0103 Rev 23 Proposed Second Floor Plan).Reason : For the avoidance of doubt.
The Council considers the amendments to be non-material and as such, it is recommended that the S96A application for a non-material amendment to be granted.
description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission 19/00582/FUL and 21/02221/NMA (Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 19/00582/FUL (Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a new 80 bed, three-storey dementia nursing home (Use Class C2) with associated gardens, pedestrian and vehicle access, car parking and servicing area). Amendment - 3 number louvres as clouded proposed measuring 150mm x 150mm to tumble dryers to ventilate to atmosphere.) for installation of re-positioned and re-designed louvres to screen roof-mounted plant.
